description.en:
Makes the FS25 Tornado dangerous! Vehicles can now be lifted, thrown, and destroyed by the wind.
Features: - Suction: Vehicles are dragged towards the funnel. - Lift: Vehicles are lifted into the air and spun around. - Destruction: Vehicles take 100% damage, wear, and dirt if they get caught in the eye. - Mass Calculation: Heavy tractors stay lower; light vehicles fly higher.
description.de: Macht den FS25-Tornado gefährlich! Fahrzeuge können jetzt vom Wind angehoben, geworfen und zerstört werden.
description.fr: Rend la tornade FS25 dangereuse! Les véhicules peuvent désormais être soulevés, projetés et détruits par le vent.
